name: Rustic Spaghetti Salad
author: Anonymous
summary: This is a very rustic, easy to prepare version of a pasta salad. Serve with a crusty whole-grain bread.
ingredients: 6 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste
¼ teaspoon minced garlic, or to taste
1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste
1 pinch ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook spaghetti at a boil until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain
Transfer spaghetti to a large bowl
Drizzle olive oil over the spaghetti; toss to coat
Add anchovy fillets, garlic, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, red pepper flakes, and black pepper; mix
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled
